snippet.title: Let's look at: Kraken Academy!! Demo | No Commentary, Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
Kraken Academy!! is set in an unorthodox school where you team up with a kraken to manipulate a time loop to save everyone. The demo promises likeable characters, great humour, and exciting customisation options.


You can still download the demo for free on Steam until 17 January: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158220/Kraken_Academy/


This video does not contain commentary - but future videos will! Let me know what you think about no commentary videos in the comments below.


Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kez_liquescent
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kez_liquescent
